name: Stick Stunt Biker
description:
Bike fun and challenging tracks using your destructible stick biker including jumps, loopings, fire and other funny obstacles. Stick Stunt Biker is an agil and fast physic based bike game, with new updates every few weeks.

• The one and only first and original bike line racing game!
• More than 10 million addicted players
• Selected by Apple for the "App Store Rewind" category for best apps and games

FEATURES:
• Includes 30 amazing tracks, 16 optional tracks and more free tracks coming with each update
• Head 2 Head racing, race against your friends directly with Bluetooth or WIFI and Game Center
• Fun ragdoll physics with destructible ragdoll
• Universal app, play on iPod, iPhone and iPad
• Destructible motor bike
• Realistic bike physics
• Realistic bike shocks
• Customizable bikes
• Jumps, Loopings, Walls, Glass, Seesaws, Fire, Elevator, Accelerators, etc.
• Different difficulties from easy to bone breaking
• Agil and fast reacting bike using accelerometer technology
• More than 80 achievements to unlock!
• Online and Offline leaderboards
• World ranking displayed after each race
• Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends
• Race against your own ghost! (ghost will show the best/last ride)
• Synchronous Game Center multiplayer racing
• Multiplayer online/bluetooth/wifi/gamecenter raceing against your friends
• Multiplayer auto match making support

Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible
Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!
